channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- MQ for HPE NonStop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- MQ for HPE NonStop

item.title: CVE-2022-22325|2024-08-03T03:07:50.498Z -- ibm -- mq%20for%20hpe%20nonstop
item.description: IBM MQ (IBM MQ for HPE NonStop 8.1.0) can inadvertently disclose sensitive information under certain circumstances to a local user from a stack trace. IBM X-Force ID: 218853.

item.title: CVE-2022-40237|2024-08-03T12:14:39.825Z -- ibm -- mq%20for%20hpe%20nonstop
item.description: IBM MQ for HPE NonStop 8.1.0 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack due to an error within the CCDT and channel synchronization logic. IBM X-Force ID: 235727.
